alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 5:27PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Baldwin County through 615 PM CDT... At 527 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Magnolia Springs, or 11 miles south of Point Clear, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Baldwin County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
